mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.name bankName, t.sort_name sortName, t.bank_icon bankIcon, t.create_user_id createUserId, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_user_id modifyUserId, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.is_set_limit_page isSetLimitPage, t.bank_code bankCode FROM t_gq_fss_bank_list t
t.name like CONCAT('%',#{bankName},'%')
